settings.text:
Shipping_Return

SHIPPING

We offer delivery and shop collect for all online orders. We offer online delivery for Metro standard orders in VIC. All online standard orders have a delivery fee of $90.

DELIVERY TIME

If the items in your order are in stock, they can be available to collect from store or be ready to dispatch within 1-3 business days.

ACCEPTANCE OF THE PRODUCT

– Tiles may vary in colour, texture, or appearance according to the manufacture’s design for that particular tile series or product line.

– Shade variations are inherent in all clay products.

– No responsibility can be accepted for crazing or shade variations.

– All tiles should be examined upon receipt.

– All ceramic tiles can be slippery when wet. Liability will not be accepted for accidents due to inappropriate tile selection, inappropriate maintenance, or carelessness.

– All tiles must be laid in accordance with recognised industry standards.

– The act of laying the material means the material is accepted for decor, shade, quality, type and size.

– It is the fixer’s responsibility to lay the material under control of the client or the client’s agent eg builder.

– No claim will be accepted once the material is laid.

RETURNS

You have 15 calendar days to return an item from the date you received it.

A handling charge of 35% will be charged on the value of all returns.
